"Character Creation":
"About Character Creation

Here, you can customize your character's appearance.
You have various base options for each part of your character, which can be further edited to control fine details.
If you make a mistake or don't like the changes you've made, you can start over by selecting \"Select Changes to Undo\" from the menu.
Your character's appearance is not set in stone when you create it. You can re-edit your appearance after reaching a certain point in the game."
